history.narrative: Law 19-316, the “Reckless Driving Amendment Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-823. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Nov. 1, 2012, and Nov 15, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Jan. 22, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-630 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-316 became effective on June 8, 2013.
